pr_title: Ignore no upstream real address agent

timeline.message: ignore no upstream real address agent

timeline.bodyText: Consider using "fast return", instead of so many nested blocks
timeline.author: kezhenxu94
kezhenxu94

timeline.bodyText:
Don't use a new file. This is a very simple config, please add a field to tracr receiver module provider.
Only If the content is complex and usually changed, we need a separated file. This fix is not that case.
This config is nearly static, nearly no one should change.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: We support list here, take a look at downsampling config. And you should put LUA as the default element.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: I think we don't need to open this to the end user. WDYT?
timeline.author: wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -180,6 +180,8 @@ receiver-trace:
     bufferFileCleanWhenRestart: ${SW_RECEIVER_BUFFER_FILE_CLEAN_WHEN_RESTART:false}
     sampleRate: ${SW_TRACE_SAMPLE_RATE:10000} # The sample rate precision is 1/10000. 10000 means 100% sample in default.
     slowDBAccessThreshold: ${SW_SLOW_DB_THRESHOLD:default:200,mongodb:100} # The slow database access thresholds. Unit ms.
+    noUpstreamRealAddressAgents: # The no upstream real address agents, service instance mapping and service instance client side relation are ignored.

timeline.bodyText: This should be initialized to include LUA. As a native agent, we know, LUA agent can't support in this value.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: I think we don't need log for this.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: We don't need the log too.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText:
I think comparing to this implementation, I would say, adding a no-@column field in the ServiceInstanceInventory to cache the status should be better in performance and understanding.
And you should avoid check the language repeatedly if this instance hasn't language properties. Such as in the new implementation, you should separate the value from null and Const#UNKNOWN.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

timeline.bodyText: I didn't notice this should be lower case. How about to use toLowerCase in the switch?
